uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.serial

Class CIdentitySerialiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.serial.CIdentitySerialiser

  • public class CIdentitySerialiser
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a set of utility methods for the serialisation of CIdentity objects to/from configuration files.
